text: The Dark Corner is a 1946 American crime thriller movie directed by Henry Hathaway and was based on the story Good Housekeeping by Leo Rosten. It stars Lucille Ball, Clifton Webb, Mark Stevens, William Bendix, Kurt Kruger, Cathy Downs, Reed Hadley and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 crime movies Category:1946 thriller movies Category:1940s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Hathaway Category:Movies set in New York City
title: The Dark Corner
